trait.name: Keen Senses
text: The scorpion cultist has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The scorpion cultist makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Sling
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
